title: Ozone Awards 2008 Nominees
text:
Ozone Awards 2008 Nominees
Ozone Awards 2008 Nominees The show is on August 11th in Houston Texas
Full nomination list:
BEST RAP ALBUM
Plies - Real Testament
Rick Ross – Trilla
Shawty Lo - Units in the City
UGK – Underground Kingz
BEST RAP ARTIST
Bun B
Lil Wayne
Plies
Rick Ross
T.I.
Young Jeezy
BEST R&B ARTIST
Chris Brown
Keyshia Cole
Ne-Yo
T-Pain
The Dream
Trey Songz
BEST RAP GROUP
Birdman & Lil Wayne
Grit Boys
Little Brother
Playaz Circle
Three 6 Mafia
UGK
BEST LYRICIST
Andre 3000
Bun B
Lil Boosie
Lil Wayne
Scarface I know they going to give it to Wayne
T.I.
BREAKTHROUGH ARTIST
Flo Rida
Gorilla Zoe
Rocko
Shawty Lo
Soulja Boy
BEST RAP/R&B COLLABORATION
2 Pistols f/ T-Pain “She Got It”
David Banner f/ Chris Brown & Yung Joc “Get Like Me”
Plies f/ Ne-Yo “Bust It Baby Pt. 2”
Ray J f/ Yung Berg “Sexy Can I”
Rick Ross f/ R Kelly “Speedin’”
Usher f/ Young Jeezy “Love In This Club”
CLUB BANGER OF THE YEAR

Lil Wayne f/ Static Major “Lollipop”
Playaz Circle f/ Lil Wayne “Duffle Bag Boy”
Shawty Lo “Dey Know”
Webbie f/ Lil Boosie & Lil Phat “Independent”
